text: avanu (doreyu, mahiḷeyaroḍane), nīvu yūsuph‌rannu pusalāyisalu prayatnisidāga nim'ma sthiti hēgittu? Endu kēḷidanu. Ā mahiḷeyaru, ‘‘allāhanu kāpāḍali. Nāvantu avanalli yāva tappannū kāṇalilla’’ endaru. Āga saradārana patni hēḷidaḷu; ‘‘īga satyavu bahiraṅgavāgibiṭṭide. Nijavāgi nānē avanannu pusalāyisalu prayatnisidde. Avanu khaṇḍita satyavantanē āgiddāne’’
